<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Empathy Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2151)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Companion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=29" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 105 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 35 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to harness

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This charm, usually placed on an animal companion's collar, contains a single strand of your hair, as well as one of your animal companion's, creating a link that better transmits emotional cues to a trained psychological assistance animal.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You attempt a saving throw against an [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effect; **Requirements** Your animal companion wearing the _empathy charm_ is within 10 feet; **Effect** Your animal companion senses the effect and attempts to calm you. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus against the triggering save.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Empathy Charm
